scenes.description: A rolling montage of supportive messages from fans around the world for the Breaking Dimensions concert.
Screen showing the official hashtag and a notice that the concert will start soon.
Visitor attention notice regarding flashing lights and cheering rules.
Showcase of made-to-order and mutual merchandise for the concert, including shirts, towels, and penlights.
Continuation of the fan message montage.

subtitles.original:
Official Hashtag / 公式ハッシュタグ / #BreakingDimensions
The concert will be starting soon. 公演開始まで、いましばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english:
Official Hashtag / #BreakingDimensions
The concert will be starting soon. Please wait for a while.

subtitles.original:
Attention For Visitors
Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.
Cheering loudly is ok.
subtitles.english:
Attention For Visitors
Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.
Cheering loudly is ok.
